title: NOMI Beauty
seo_title: Nomi Beauty WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: Nomi Beauty WestHouse Hotel New York
contents:
WestHouse is pleased to partner with NOMI Beauty, the premier in-room hair and makeup service provider. NOMI Beauty is your go-to beauty solution while traveling, making it effortless to get ready for your important business meeting, social event, or exciting night out in the city. Their elite team of expertly-trained hair stylists and makeup artists are hand-picked and guarantee consistent, high quality results.

Schedule hair styling and makeup services in the comfort of your room by calling the Concierge or downloading the NOMI Beauty mobile app. Enjoy a personalized, one-on-one consultation, and choose from their signature range of inspirational looks. For more information on available services, view the NOMI Lookbook.

NOMI brings the best of beauty directly to your hotel room, and appointments are available from 6:30am to 9pm daily. Book your appointment today.

Looking good has never been this easy.
